title: Beyond the Horror: Cult Episode 7
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I loved the twists in this episode! It's great how they added that twist to bring more reality to the series. I believe it's also tieing other seasons together

I'll be honest, I liked the whole Zodiac aspect they added. I mean they only told a lil blip in "Frances's" life to show how she became crazy. I just thought it was cool, reminded me of the movie The Zodiac with Jake Gyllenhaal lol

Eh...? I dunno why everyone is upset about the Zodiac killer aspect. I mean in Murder House they revealed how The Black Dalia was killed even though in reality it's still unsolved. I thought seeing historical stuff from other perspectives is pretty interesting. After all...it's just a TV show. It's entertainment...not real. But to each their own.
With this season so far I'm gonna give it a 7.5 this episode braught it down lol.

Hay MaryGirl. I actually liked the whole Zodiac Killer twist a lot !!.

I mean, think about it. The real Zodiac Killer's identity was never revealed & found out so Ryan Murphy can pretty much take all the liberty and freedom with it to do what he wants. And i think adding the Zodiac Killer in some aspect is really cool i think.
description:
VIDEO CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR American Horror Story, Season 7, Episode 7!!!

Beyond the Horror: Cult, is an unofficial American Horror Story Live After Show. Hosted by MaryGirl Moody. Special Guests include: Jonas Bendor and Tami Sifford. We discuss and review each episode of American Horror Story Cult.
